attributes.action: highlight the plight of the Tibetan people and pressure China to free Tibet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is predicted by the Dalai Lama that Tibet along with its culture and tradition could face extinction in just 15 years!

We the British people want to know what steps our government is taking to assist the Tibetan people in gaining back their freedom from oppression and what pressure is being brought to bear on China to free Tibet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
